name: Randuin's Omen
tooltip:
Randuin's Omen

Cost: 2700
+10 Ability Haste
+80 Armor
+250 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from basic attacks by 5 per 1000 maximum health, capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

UNIQUE Active - Humility: Slow nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduce their attack damage by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).
